item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1566; 10:19PM; 6000 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R2MbzL; Woodland Hills; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters made significant progress and extinguished the majority of the large blaze in one hour and nine minutes. The remaining pockets of fire are difficult to reach with exterior hose lines and due to the structural instability, crews will remain in the defensive mode. Therefore this will continue to be an active, extended operation. Drivers are advised to avoid the area surrounding De Soto x Oxnard. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section will handle the investigation per protocol. There are no injuries reported and no other structures damaged. No further details.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC14 BC15 BC9 CE59 CM42 E100 E106 E233 E239 E266 E28 E288 E289 E293 E296 E305 E39 E70 E73 E8 E88 EA1 EM14 EM9 HR3 RA105 RA106 RA39 RA84 T105 T33 T39 T66 T88 T89 T93 T96 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#1549; 09:47PM; 19700 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AF5fhN; Winnetka; Final patient count is nine: three patients were determined deceased on scene. 25yo M, 30yo M and 30yo M. The remaining six patients (ages/genders not available at this time) all sustained *potentially* serious injuries due to the mechanism of injury but all were stable upon transport. Any further queries are referred to LAPD Inc# 3970. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E72 E87 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA104 RA107 RA70 RA72 RA73 RA84 RA87 RA93 T73; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1566; 09:37PM; 6000 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R2MbzL; Woodland Hills; This incident is now at the Major Emergency status with over 80 firefighters assigned. The building is fully involved and the structural integrity of the building is starting to fail along at least one corner. There are no injuries reported and no other structures threatened. Traffic will be heavily impacted in the area and drivers are advised to avoid the area. This will be an extended operation.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC14 BC15 BC9 CM42 E100 E106 E233 E266 E28 E288 E289 E293 E296 E305 E39 E70 E73 E8 E88 EA1 EM9 HR3 RA105 RA106 RA84 T105 T33 T66 T88 T89 T93 T96 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#1549; 09:01PM; 19700 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AF5fhN; Winnetka; Firefighters are on scene of a 3 vehicle collision with initial reports of 10 patients - Three patients are determined to be deceased on scene, seven additional patients are being evaluated with varying injuries. Additional resources requested. LAPD Inc# 3970; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E273 E72 EM15 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA84 RA93 T73; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1566; 09:10PM; 6000 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R2MbzL; Woodland Hills; One story, large (vacant) commercial building (approx 100' x 200') with fire through the roof. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. Two additional task forces requested. ; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 E100 E106 E293 E305 E73 RA105 RA106 RA84 T105 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0531; 10:28AM; 1788 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bOhtdd; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN: 37 firefighters extinguished the fire in 43 minutes with no injuries reported. While crews quickly knocked by the flames within the business, the attic and facade fire took longer to isolate and access all remaining pockets of fire. No injuries reported. The extent of fire and/or smoke damage through the structure is not known at this time. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 BC9 CM22 CM42 E261 E292 E294 E34 E43 E58 E68 EM14 RA58 RA858 T61 T92 T94; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0531; 10:22AM; 1788 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bOhtdd; Mid-City; Firefighters are making good progress with an offensive operation and are chasing down the last of the fire in the building's fa√ßade. The fire appears to have originated in a pizzeria and extended into the attic. The structure is a small, one story (L-shaped) strip mall and the extent of possible fire damage to additional units is unknown at this time. Some LAFD resources are being released as crews are nearing extinguishment. ; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 BC9 CM22 CM42 E261 E292 E294 E34 E43 E58 E68 EM14 RA58 RA858 T61 T92 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0531; 09:45AM; 1788 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bOhtdd; Mid-City; One story strip mall with heavy smoke showing. The initial report indicates an attic fire of a pizza restaurant. One additional task force requested.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC5 BC9 E261 E292 E43 E58 E68 RA58 RA858 T61 T92; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0511; 09:51AM; 352 W Slauson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nywrH2; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. After crews started making good progress, they transitioned to an offensive operation, moving inside for an interior fire attack (no roof operations). The building is divided into three units and the fire was primarily centered in one business (appears to be a wood-working operation). There are no injuries reported. Some LAFD resources are being released (knockdown achieved prior to the arrival of some of the added units). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC2 CM22 E205 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E5 E57 E66 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA266 RA33 RA46 RA857 RA866 SQ21 T21 T33 T5 T66 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0511; 09:29AM; 352 W Slauson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nywrH2; Florence; One story, (metal clad) commercial building with fire showing through the roof. Firefighters are conducting forcible entry to gain access and conduct a defensive fire attack. There are no other structures exposed. No injuries reported. CHP are being notified for smoke impact on the Harbor Freeway (possible lane closures) refer to https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for closure updates. CHP Log# 991. Additional resources requested. The incident is titled Broadway IC.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E46 E66 RA266 RA46 RA857 RA866 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
